Description:en: A patient's systolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
A patient's diastolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
Patient pulse rate, as measured with a peripheral oximeter.
MUAC is the circumference of the left upper arm, measured at the mid-point between the tip of the shoulder and the tip of the elbow. MUAC is useful for the assessment of nutritional status.
Measured respiratory rate in breaths per minute
Zero to 100 scale commonly used for assessing terminally ill patients.
Oxygen saturation, as measured from a peripheral oximeter.
